column1: Kata Robata////My 2 complaints are the middle room
column2: wear they always seat me could use sprucing up. It looks like a facing fast food restaurant for the prices that one pays. More importantly is the hostesses. If you go there
column3: make sure you make reservations. The hostess acts like you are asking for a table for 2 at 10:30 at night New Year's Eve at a 5 star restaurant in NYC overlooking Time Square. I did this twice
column5: and I was dressed nicely with make up and heels
column6: so it was not about looking too casual.
